mapper.select: select count(*) from `order` o where o.user_id = #{uId}
select count(*) from `order` o where o.user_id = #{uId} and to_days(o.order_time)=to_days(#{time})
select count(*) from `order` o,order_detail od,category c where o.user_id = #{uId} and o.id = od.order_id and od.category_id = c.id and c.type = #{type}
select count(*) from `order` o,order_detail od,category c where o.user_id = #{uId} and o.id = od.order_id and od.category_id = c.id and c.type = #{type} and to_days(o.order_time)=to_days(#{time})
